DataElement.preferredName: Intravenous Treatment Or Hospitalization Infection Prior One Year Present Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The count related to the number of times a patient had an infection that required hospitalization or intravenous treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intravenous Treatment Or Hospitalization Infection Prior One Year Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: _(in-tra-VEE-nus) IV. Within a blood vessel._(in-tra-VEE-nus) IV. Within a blood vessel._A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment._The condition of being treated as a patient in a hospital._information related to infection, a disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent_The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (in-tra-VEE-nus) IV. Within a blood vessel.:A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.:The condition of being treated as a patient in a hospital.:A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact. -- 2003

Concepts.definition: Into or within a vein. Intravenous usually refers to a way of giving a drug or other substance through a needle or tube inserted into a vein.
A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
The condition of being treated as a patient in a hospital.
A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.
